name: date-fns-example-typescript
description: Example of date-fns usage with TypeScript
author: Sasha Koss <koss@nocorp.me>

scripts.build: yarn build-date-fns && yarn build-typescript && yarn build-webpack
scripts.build-typescript: tsc  --outDir dist example.ts fp.ts misc.ts constants.ts --lib es2015,dom --esModuleInterop
scripts.build-webpack: webpack example=./dist/example.js fp=./dist/fp misc=./dist/misc.js constants=./dist/constants.js --mode production --output-path dist --output-filename [name].bundle.js
scripts.test: yarn test-example && yarn test-fp && yarn test-misc && yarn test-constants
